  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2074</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">An holistic approach to introducing geoscience into schools:The Israeli Model from Pratice to Theory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine holistic Annäherung an das Einführen von 
von geoscience in schools:The israelisches Modell von Pratice zur 
Theorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une approche holistique à présenter le 
geoscience dans le modèle israélien de schools:The de Pratice à la 
théorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma aproximação holística a introduzir o 
geoscience no modelo israeli de schools:The de Pratice à teoria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un metodo holistic a introdurre geoscience nel 
modello israeliano di schools:The da Pratice alla teoria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ολιστική προσέγγιση στην εισαγωγή του geoscience
στο ισραηλινό μοντέλο schools:The από Pratice στη θεωρία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un acercamiento holístico a introducir geoscience
en modelo israelí de schools:The de Pratice a la teoría</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The article discusses the planning for the first stages of introducing earthsciences into the Israeli school curricula at all levels.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">curriculum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holistic</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Artikel behandelt die Planung für die ersten 
Stadien des Einführens von von earthsciences in die israelischen 
Schulelehrpläne auf allen Stufen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'article discute la planification pour les 
premières étapes de présenter des earthsciences dans les programmes
d'études israéliens d'école à tous les niveaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O artigo discute o planeamento para os primeiros 
estágios de introduzir earthsciences nos curricula israeli da escola 
em todos os níveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'articolo discute la progettazione per le prime 
fasi di introduzione dei earthsciences nei programmi di studi 
israeliani della scuola a tutti i livelli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το άρθρο συζητά τον προγραμματισμό για τα πρώτα 
στάδια της εισαγωγής των earthsciences στα ισραηλινά σχολικά 
προγράμματα σπουδών σε όλα τα επίπεδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El artículo discute las hojas de operación 
(planning) para las primeras etapas de introducir earthsciences en los
planes de estudios israelíes de la escuela en todos los niveles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
